response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $15,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $12,000. I am confident that this price reflects the true worth of the item while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Should you choose to accept this offer, I promise a seamless and professional experience. If you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 12000}
